settings.title: Product Details
settings.description:
JACKET

4 Way Stretch Fabric

Stretch Lining

2-Button Single Breasted

Notch Lapel

Side Vents

Flap Pockets

PANTS

4 Way Stretch Fabric

SuperFlex Waistband

Flat Front

Line To The Knee

settings.title: Shipping & returns
settings.description: Free shipping and free returns! All items that are unworn, unwashed, and have the original tags attached are eligible for a full refund up 30 days from purchase.

settings.iconsubtitle: A suit that moves with you
Waistband stretches up to 2 inches for maximum comfort.

settings.title: Why Rent When You Can Buy?

settings.text: Use our quick sizing accessment tool to tailor your suit to the perfect fit.
Dress it up, however you like! Choose your color,accessories and more!
Browse some of our suggested looks to seamlessly style your group
